Name: ROSMARINIC ACID
Synonyms: Labiatenic acid pound>>(R)-rosmarinic acid pound>>Rosemary acid

plant_concentrations.References: (1) Rosmarinic Acid; Available as of Dec 28, 2012: https://rosmarinicacid.com/
plant_concentrations.Value: Rosmarinic acid is derived from many common herbal plants of the Lamiaceae group: rosemary, sage, spanish sage, oregano, basil, marjoram, thyme, the mint group, lavender, perilla and lemon balm(1).
